Package vivae.ros.simulator.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AgentSpawningSynchronousClient
    This is synchronous simulation client which is able to spawn agents in the SimulatorServer.
    RegisteredAgentBuilder
    This class will build ROS agents that are registered in the ViVae simulator, this includes: -load the map -spawn agent -create and return the class which sends/receives data from/to registered agent -start the simulation -stop the simulation
    SynchornousClient
    This client is purposed to connect to the SimulatorServer and call controls of the simulator, e.g.: -loadMap -start -stop -reset (destroys the current simulation and starts the new one) -spawn agent..
